attributes.action: Increase student loan amount for art students as they have to buy so many art materials throughout their degree.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: An art student has an average spend of £50-£70 a week at times during their degree. Much higher that other degrees, yet they get the same loan as everyone else. Their work can suffer through lack of funds or lack of time due to more part-time work.
